channel.title: Comment / Uncomment
channel.description: okay, so this client is telling me to go into client.java and uncomment out the client() - Findcachedir() and String cachelink() where is all this? and im sure i can figure out how to comment it out, just not understanding where there talking about commenting it out.

item.title: Comment / Uncomment
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“vert642, post:2, topic:551424”]You open client.java
Use CTRL+F and search for the functions you wrote upper
Remove the “//” or “/* /"
If the comment is on "/” you need to remove the “*/” also or you’ll get errors and won’t be able to compile/run the client[/quote]

I done this already im done with it lol thank you anyways for the help i figured it all out

Read full topic

item.title: Comment / Uncomment
item.dc:creator: @vert642 vert642
item.description:
@vert642 wrote:

You open client.java
Use CTRL+F and search for the functions you wrote upper
Remove the “//” or “/* /"
If the comment is on "/” you need to remove the “*/” also or you’ll get errors and won’t be able to compile/run the client

Read full topic
